metadata.description: Comprehensive timeline for Revenue Stream Hijacking case 2025-137857
metadata.changes: Enhanced timeline with 2026-01-22 refinements, added Ketoni timeline entries

timeline.event: ALOECO (SA) original company registered
L'IMAGE CC registered
S A Logistic Services CC registered by Louw

timeline.description: RegimA Skin Treatments (1992/005371/23) registered as Close Corporation. Peter Andrew Faucitt appointed as founding member.

Louw becomes director of ALOECO (SA) original
UFO Express CC registered
Rizzotto becomes 100% member of UFO Express
East Coast Logistics CC registered
LMS Logistic Services registered
S A Logistic Services enters liquidation

timeline.description: S A Logistic Services enters liquidation

timeline.title: AYMAC International CC Registration
timeline.description: AYMAC International (1999/061687/23) registered. Peter Andrew Faucitt appointed as member.

timeline.event: Nanini 262 CC registered by Louw
Kachan Marketing and Distribution CC registered - Karen Avnit 100% member

timeline.event: ALOECO (SA) CC registered - Louw 51%

timeline.description: Jacqueline Faucitt appointed as 50% member of RegimA Skin Treatments CC.
timeline.significance: Establishes Jacqueline's formal role in RST

timeline.event: Karen Avnit purchases SS Forest Lodge 173, Unit 4 for R1,100,000
Barend Nortje appointed director of De Fay Fund Management
RegimA International Skin Treatments CC established

timeline.title: Strategic Logistics CC Registration
timeline.description: Strategic Logistics (2008/136496/23) registered as Close Corporation with Daniel James Faucitt as founding member (33%).
timeline.significance: Establishes SLG as a separate entity for packaging/logistics

timeline.title: RegimA Worldwide Distribution Registration
timeline.description: RegimA Worldwide Distribution (2011/005722/07) registered. Originally named Clear Creek Trading 139 (shelf company). Christian Gouws (attorney) resigned same day. Peter, Jacqueline, and Daniel Faucitt appointed as directors.

timeline.event: K Rae Enterprises (later Dandelion SA) registered

timeline.title: EVENT_102
timeline.description: Dandelion SA (formerly K Rae Enterprises) registered

timeline.event: Chané Todd becomes director of Dandelion SA; Kirby Van Der Stelt resigns

timeline.title: Jacqueline and Peter Faucitt Added to Strategic Logistics
timeline.description: Jacqueline and Peter Faucitt added as 33% members each to Strategic Logistics CC, changing the ownership structure.

timeline.event: Rezonance registered (shelf company)

timeline.title: EVENT_092
timeline.description: Rezonance registered as shelf company by Dennis Bishop

timeline.title: EVENT_H011
timeline.description: RegimaSA (Pty) Ltd incorporated as Collections Agent

timeline.event: RegimA Medic registered (shelf company)

timeline.title: EVENT_093
timeline.description: RegimA Medic registered as shelf company by Dennis Bishop

timeline.title: Daniel's 2017 Company Formation Spree
timeline.description: Daniel James Faucitt registered multiple companies in April-May 2017: ReZonance, RegimA Medic, RegimA Zone Academy, RegimA SA, RegimA Zone, RegimA SpaZone.

timeline.event: Daniel Faucitt & Kayla Pretorius take over Rezonance from Dennis Bishop

timeline.title: EVENT_094
timeline.description: Rezonance transferred from Dennis Bishop to Daniel Faucitt and Kayla Pretorius

timeline.title: RegimA Medic and RegimA Zone Academy Registration
timeline.description: RegimA Medic (2017/087877/07) and RegimA Zone Academy (2017/113134/07) registered with Daniel James Faucitt as director.

timeline.event: Faucitts take over RegimA Medic from Dennis Bishop

timeline.title: EVENT_095
timeline.description: RegimA Medic transferred from Dennis Bishop to Faucitt family

timeline.title: RegimA SA and RegimA Zone Registration
timeline.description: RegimA SA (2017/087935/07) and RegimA Zone (2017/110437/07) registered with Daniel James Faucitt as director.
timeline.significance: Further expansion of RegimA brand entities

timeline.title: RegimA SpaZone Registration
timeline.description: RegimA SpaZone (2017/081833/07) registered with Daniel James Faucitt as director.

timeline.title: First ReZonance Invoice to RST
timeline.description: First invoice from ReZonance to RegimA Skin Treatments for Google GSuite services (R250.80), marking the beginning of business relationship

timeline.event: Bertani International Global registered - Dante Bertani director

timeline.title: EVENT_103
timeline.description: Bertani International Global registered

timeline.title: ReZonance Service Expansion
timeline.description: Major service expansion with multiple enterprise services (R100,000+), substantial increase in service provision and financial exposure

timeline.event: Who Owns Whom Cosmetics Industry report published listing RegimA

timeline.title: EVENT_096
timeline.description: Who Owns Whom Cosmetics Industry report published listing RegimA International Skin Treatments CC

timeline.event: Rizzotto joins ALOECO (SA) CC as 49% member

timeline.title: EVENT_098
timeline.description: Rizzotto joins Louw's ALOECO (SA) CC as 49% member

timeline.title: EVENT_H012
timeline.description: RegimaSA first financial year end (15 months) showing zero revenue, R1,589 loss, minimal activity

timeline.title: Financial Year Commencement RST/SLG
timeline.description: Beginning of financial year for RegimA Skin Treatments (RST) and Strategic Logistics (SLG). This marks the start of the period covered by trial balance evidence showing systematic financial manipulation.

timeline.title: Financial Year Commencement Villa Via
timeline.description: Beginning of financial year for Villa Via. Different year-end from RST/SLG creates complexity in group reporting and opportunities for manipulation.

timeline.title: ALOECO Registration with Shared Address
timeline.description: ALOECO (SA) registered by Alan Peter Louw and Martin Carlo Rizzotto. Directors use PO Box 9477 Edenglen - same postal address area as Faucitt companies (PO Box 9523 Edenglen).

timeline.event: ALOECO (SA) CC converts to company K2019531306

timeline.title: Adderory Company Registration and Stock Supply Arrangement
timeline.description: Adderory company registration and stock supply arrangement with RegimA (potential fictitious supplier)

timeline.event: RegimA Skin Treatments CC registers R3,110,000 bond on Karen Avnit's property

timeline.title: EVENT_99
timeline.description: RegimA Skin Treatments CC registers R3,110,000 bond on Karen Avnit's property

timeline.title: Marlouw Group Registration
timeline.description: Marlouw Group (2019/612808/07) registered with Alan Peter Louw and Martin Carlo Rizzotto as directors.

timeline.title: Coordinated Inter-Company Cost Reallocations
timeline.description: Multiple adjusting journal entries across entities on same date: RWW R500K stock provision write-back, RWW R810K admin fee reallocation to production costs, SLG R252K admin fee reallocation to production costs, SLG R80K production cost transfer to RST. Coordinated timing suggests deliberate manipulation.

timeline.title: Year-End Inter-Company Interest and Loan Transactions
timeline.description: Critical year-end adjustments: SLG pays R414,334.09 interest to RST per loan agreement (3.19% rate on R13M debt), RST advances R750K loan to RWW for production costs, Directors' fee adjustment of R784K in RST. These transactions demonstrate profit shifting from SLG to RST.

timeline.title: Villa Via Year-End - Capital Extraction Evidence
timeline.description: Villa Via financial year-end showing R3.7M profit from R4.4M rental income, while maintaining R22.8M members loan account. Members loan is 5.2x annual rental income, indicating systematic capital extraction over multiple years.

timeline.title: Daniel James Faucitt Added as Director to RWD
timeline.description: Daniel James Faucitt formally added as director to RegimA Worldwide Distribution. Address updated to GB (Great Britain).
timeline.significance: Formalizes Daniel's directorship in RWD, country of residence GB

timeline.event: Peter and Jacqueline Faucitt appointed as directors of RegimA Medic

timeline.title: Bantjies Sends Trial Balance Email to Bernadine Wright
timeline.description: Email from Danie Bantjes to Bernadine Wright, Jacqui Faucitt (Jax), Peter Andrew Faucitt, Rynette Farrar, and Daniel Faucitt with final trial balances. 6-month delay from year-end suggests complex manipulation requiring extended finalization. Meeting scheduled with Bernadine Wright for sign-off.

timeline.title: Rynette Farrar Demonstrates Sage System Control
timeline.description: Screenshot evidence shows Rynette with control of Sage accounting system and access to Pete@regima.com email

timeline.title: CIPC Annual Return Filing - Regima Worldwide Distribution
timeline.description: Annual return filed for Regima Worldwide Distribution showing director positions and shareholding

timeline.title: Pandamania Registration
timeline.description: Pandamania (2021/306676/07) registered with Daniel James Faucitt as director.

timeline.title: Adderory Companies Registration - Pre-Planning Phase
timeline.description: Rynette's son registered Adderory (Pty) Ltd and Adderory Skin (Pty) Ltd, establishing competing business infrastructure 4 years before fraud escalation. Demonstrates long-term conspiracy planning.

timeline.title: Kayla Pretorius Estate Documentation
timeline.description: Estate documentation for Kayla Pretorius, whose email account later became subject to court-ordered seizure

timeline.title: CIPC WinDeed Reports Generated
timeline.description: Comprehensive CIPC WinDeed reports generated for all Faucitt family companies and related entities. 18 documents covering company registrations, director searches, and corporate history.
timeline.significance: Evidence collection date for corporate records

timeline.title: ReZonance Opening Balance Debt
timeline.description: Opening balance showing substantial accumulated debt to ReZonance (R971,587.93), evidence of unpaid services over extended period

timeline.title: First Structured Payment to ReZonance
timeline.description: First structured payment to ReZonance (R40,000), attempt to manage debt through partial payments

timeline.title: EVENT_067
timeline.description: RegimA WWD paid R157k+ to ReZonance, reducing debt from R85k to R22k (July-December 2022)

timeline.title: Ketoni Investment Holdings Incorporation
timeline.description: Ketoni Investment Holdings (Pty) Ltd incorporated, establishing the entity that would later owe ZAR 18.75M to FFT.

timeline.title: ReZonance Final Balance Persistent Debt
timeline.description: Final balance showing persistent debt to ReZonance (R1,035,361.34) despite payment claims, debt continues to grow

timeline.title: False Payment Claim #1 to ReZonance
timeline.description: RegimA claims payment of R470,000 to ReZonance not reflected in ReZonance records, first documented false payment claim

timeline.title: FFT Investment in Ketoni - ZAR 18.75M Entitlement Established
timeline.description: Faucitt Family Trust invests in Ketoni Investment Holdings, establishing ZAR 18.75M payout entitlement with three-year payout schedule (May 2026, May 2027, May 2029). This investment creates the central financial motive for all subsequent trust control actions.

timeline.title: Bantjies Joins The George Group as CFO
timeline.description: Daniel Jacobus Bantjies joins The George Group as CFO, one month after FFT receives Ketoni share certificate. Kevin Derrick (Ketoni Director) is also a director at The George Group.

timeline.title: Kayla Pretorius Murder
timeline.description: Murder of Kayla Pretorius, creating estate complications, law enforcement investigation, and family trauma. Estate includes ReZonance debt of R1,035,000.

timeline.title: Kayla Pretorius Death - Creditor Elimination Phase
timeline.description: Kayla Pretorius (Dan's partner, ReZonance director) dies 80 days after FFT Ketoni investment. ReZonance owed R1,035,000+ by RegimA Skin Treatments. Death eliminates primary creditor obstacle to trust control consolidation.
evidence: SF7 - Court Order Kayla Email Seizure
timeline.significance: CRITICAL: Eliminates R1M creditor obstacle 80 days after ZAR 18.75M investment
timeline.timing_analysis: T-34 months before payout, 80 days after investment
timeline.ketoni_context: ZAR 18.75M payout dwarfs R1M debt - debt is obstacle to control

timeline.title: Kayla Pretorius Death - 80 Days After Ketoni Investment
timeline.description: Kayla Pretorius dies 80 days after FFT's Ketoni investment. This death triggers estate proceedings and potential asset appropriation opportunity.
evidence_refs: SF7 - Court Order Kayla Email Seizure

timeline.title: False Payment Claim #2 to ReZonance
timeline.description: Additional false payment claims totaling R765,361.34 to ReZonance, escalation of fraudulent payment claims

timeline.title: Court Order for Kayla Pretorius Email Account Seizure
timeline.description: Court orders seizure of Kayla Pretorius email account for evidence of fraudulent activities

timeline.title: ReZonance Dissolution Pressure - Debt Obstacle Elimination
timeline.description: Pressure applied to dissolve ReZonance and eliminate R1,035,000+ debt claim against RegimA Skin Treatments. Part of creditor elimination phase before trust control consolidation.
timeline.significance: Eliminate R1M debt obstacle before trust control consolidation
timeline.ketoni_context: Clear debt obstacle before May 2026 payout distribution

timeline.title: Bantjies Appointed FFT Trustee - Control Consolidation Phase
timeline.description: Daniel Jacobus Bantjies appointed as FFT Trustee by Rynette, exactly T-10 months before May 2026 payout. Bantjies is colleague of Kevin Derrick (Ketoni Director) and accountant for all Faucitt companies.
timeline.significance: CRITICAL: Strategic trustee appointment T-10 months before ZAR 18.75M payout
timeline.timing_analysis: T-10 months before payout - precise timing for control consolidation
timeline.ketoni_context: Appointee connected to Ketoni director, positioned to control payout distribution

timeline.title: Bantjies Appointed FFT Trustee by Rynette
timeline.description: Daniel Jacobus Bantjies appointed as Trustee of Faucitt Family Trust by Rynette, T-10 months before Ketoni payout. Strategic appointment to consolidate trust control.

timeline.title: Chantal Delivers Letter About Kayla Estate Finalization
timeline.description: Chantal delivers letter to office regarding Kayla estate finalization, indicating ongoing exploitation of deceased victim's estate

timeline.title: R900,000 Unauthorized Transfers from RegimA SA
timeline.description: Peter made unauthorized transfers of R900,000 from RegimA SA without Daniel's authority as co-director

timeline.title: R5.2M SLG Stock Missing & Large Invoice
timeline.description: R5.2M SLG stock missing with simultaneous R5.2M invoice from SLG to RST. Stock physically disappeared, same type later supplied by Adderory to RegimA. Systematic asset stripping begins.

timeline.title: R5.4M Stock Disappears from Strategic Logistics
timeline.description: R5.4M worth of stock physically disappears from Strategic Logistics warehouse. Represents 46% of annual sales, 10x historical adjustment rate. Same stock type later supplied by Adderory (Rynette's son's company) to RegimA.

timeline.title: R5.4M Stock Adjustment Processed Without Investigation
timeline.description: R5.4M written off as simple 'stock adjustment' without investigation, supporting documentation, or proper authorization. Bantjies as accountant should have investigated 46% loss but did not, demonstrating complicity.

timeline.title: Two Years Unallocated Expenses Dumped
timeline.description: Rynette and Peter dumped two years' worth of unallocated expenses from all companies into RegimA Worldwide and pressured Daniel to sign off within 12 hours for SARS VAT & Annual Accounts. Daniel used time until June 6th to finalize reports and uncover fraud.

timeline.title: Payment Redirection Scheme
timeline.description: Part of R4.28M+ financial diversions. Payments redirected from platform owned/paid by RegimA Zone Ltd (UK)

timeline.title: Rynette Bank Letter for RegimA Worldwide Diversion
timeline.description: Setup for R3.14M+ revenue theft. First documented act in coordinated scheme. Attempted redirect of payments from Dan's UK-funded infrastructure

timeline.title: Peter Orders Cloud IT Systems Removal
timeline.description: Peter instructs removal of all cloud IT systems, systematic dismantling of cloud-based infrastructure as preparation for evidence destruction

timeline.title: Server Missing from Office
timeline.description: Physical server hardware disappears from office premises, potential evidence destruction or data harvesting in preparation for subsequent financial crimes

timeline.title: Unauthorized Beneficiary Changes
timeline.description: Exclusion of legitimate beneficiaries. Direct violation of trust obligations and beneficiary rights

timeline.title: Jacqui Confronts Rynette About R1,035,000 Debt
timeline.description: Jacqui confronted Rynette regarding R1,035,000 owed by RegimA Skin Treatments to Rezonance since Feb 2023. Jacqui stated these funds were part of Kayla's estate and keeping them would be profiting from proceeds of murder.

timeline.title: Shopify Audit Trail Hijacking
timeline.description: CRITICAL EVENT: R1M+ monthly revenue → R0 (100% business shutdown). Central evidence destruction event proving consciousness of guilt. Destruction of audit trails for platform owned, paid, operated by RegimA Zone Ltd (UK) since July 2023 - proves RWD ZA has no independent revenue stream. Orders removed from Shopify following Jacqui's confrontation.

timeline.title: Orders Removed from Shopify Platform
timeline.description: Orders systematically removed from Shopify platform, disrupting business operations and revenue tracking.

timeline.title: Adderory Registers regimaskin.co.za Domain
timeline.description: Customer hijacking platform. Family conspiracy escalation and digital impersonation. Domain registered to impersonate business on Dan's UK-funded platform. New domain regimaskin.co.za registered by Adderory (Rynette's son's company) following Shopify shutdown.

timeline.title: Daniel Sends Comprehensive Reports to Bantjies
timeline.description: Daniel exposes Villa Via fraud (86% rent profit extraction) to Bantjies (as accountant, unaware of trustee appointment). Fraud threatens to expose trust control mechanisms before May 2026 payout.

timeline.title: Cards Cancelled <24 Hours After Fraud Exposure
timeline.description: Dan's cards cancelled less than 24 hours after exposing fraud to Bantjies. Immediate retaliation demonstrates coordination and intent to punish fraud exposure.

timeline.title: Bantjies Learns of Criminal Matters
timeline.description: CRITICAL EVENT: Bantjies dismisses Daniel's audit request 4 days after Daniel exposed Villa Via fraud. Audit would have discovered R5.4M stock adjustment fraud and systematic inter-company manipulation. Demonstrates consciousness of guilt and protection of fraud scheme.
evidence_refs: Email: The RegimA Group results and Computer Expense analysis (2025-06-10)

timeline.title: Systematic Trust Violations
timeline.description: Trustee misconduct and self-dealing. Clear evidence of trustee misconduct and self-dealing

timeline.title: Email Impersonation Pattern and Domain Switch Instruction
timeline.description: R3.1M+ losses enabled by email control. Pattern of impersonation supporting criminal conspiracy charges. Email control facilitated fraud related to platform paid by Dan's UK company since July 2023. Email from Gee in Aug explained to Jax that she was instructed to send out 'don't use regima.zone only use regimaskin.co.za email'.
evidence_refs: SF2A - Sage Control User Access screenshot

timeline.title: EVENT_064
timeline.description: RegimaSA 2019 financial statements prepared and issued by Marisca Meyer, 6+ years after period end

timeline.title: Coordinated Fund Diversions
timeline.description: Complex financial flow manipulation. Evidence of sophisticated financial crime coordination. Fund diversions targeted revenue from infrastructure continuously funded by RegimA Zone Ltd

timeline.title: Warehouse POPI Violations
timeline.description: Complete operational shutdown. Documented evidence of systematic business destruction. Shutdown of operations for platform continuously funded by RegimA Zone Ltd (28 months)

timeline.title: Account Manipulation
timeline.description: Financial control seizure. Documented evidence of financial system abuse and unauthorized control. Control seized over accounts receiving Shopify revenue from Dan's UK-paid platform

timeline.title: Sage Subscription Expired - Access Obstruction
timeline.description: Sage accounting subscription expired, Rynette controls reactivation, all parties denied access for over 1 month

timeline.title: Trust Asset Misappropriation
timeline.description: Trust property theft. Documented theft of trust property and breach of fiduciary duty

timeline.title: Trust Breach Evidence
timeline.description: Complete compromise of trust integrity. Systematic evidence of ongoing trust law violations

timeline.title: Settlement Agreement Signed - Main Trustee Power Backdated
timeline.description: Jacqueline signs document backdating Peter's 'Main Trustee' designation to 2025-07-01. This grants Peter sole control over FFT before May 2026 payout.

timeline.title: Peter Files Founding Affidavit with Material Non-Disclosures
timeline.description: Peter and Bantjies file interdict against Jax and Dan, 48 hours after Jax signed Main Trustee document. Neutralizes both beneficiaries T-9 months before May 2026 payout.

timeline.title: Gee Email Explaining Domain Switch Instruction
timeline.description: Email from Gee to Jax explaining that she was instructed to send out 'don't use regima.zone only use regimaskin.co.za email' on June 20, 2025. Confirms customer hijacking scheme.

timeline.title: Financial Evidence Concealment
timeline.description: Cover-up operations demonstrating guilt. Consciousness of guilt through evidence destruction attempts. Cover-up attempt to conceal fact that RWD ZA has no independent revenue stream - all revenue from Dan's UK-funded Shopify platform

timeline.title: ENS Africa Acknowledges Criminal Matters Then Suppresses
timeline.description: ENS Africa acknowledges receipt of criminal matters information with 'Received, thanks Daniel' email, then suppresses this information from Court

timeline.title: Company Accounts Emptied
timeline.description: All company accounts emptied, potentially because Daniel was still managing to pay creditors despite 6 months of sabotage.

timeline.title: R63M Formal Demand by Ian Levitt Attorneys
timeline.description: Ian Levitt Attorneys sends formal demand letter for R63M, which is subsequently ignored by Peter and legal team.

timeline.title: Ketoni ZAR 18.75M Payout Due - ALL EVENTS CONVERGE
timeline.description: First payout date for Ketoni ZAR 18.75M to Faucitt Family Trust. ALL EVENTS from April 2023 onwards converge on this date. Peter has consolidated sole control, neutralized Jax as trustee, and targeted Dan for curatorship to control his share.
timeline.significance: CENTRAL CONVERGENCE POINT: All trust control actions converge on this payout date
timeline.ketoni_context: Central financial motive for all events since April 2023

jax_vindication.insight: Evidence shows Jax as fraud detector, not perpetrator
jax_vindication.implication: Supports defense narrative of Jax as victim
jax_vindication.strategic_value: Undermines prosecution claims of Jax involvement
jax_vindication.action_required: Emphasize Jax's role in confronting fraud (May 15, 2025)

pre_fraud_baseline.insight: Trial balance evidence provides pre-fraud baseline
pre_fraud_baseline.strategic_value: Shows pattern of behavior, not isolated incident
pre_fraud_baseline.action_required: Integrate 2020 evidence into current case narrative

rynette_continuity.insight: Rynette had financial access in 2020 and led 2025 cover-up
rynette_continuity.implication: Establishes long-term involvement in financial manipulation
rynette_continuity.strategic_value: Proves pattern of access and control over 5 years
rynette_continuity.action_required: Map Rynette's access evolution from 2020 to 2025

bantjes_connection.implication: Links financial manipulation expertise to trust control
bantjes_connection.strategic_value: Explains why Bantjes was chosen as Trustee
bantjes_connection.action_required: Investigate Bantjes' role in both capacities
